verses.verse: A Psalm of Asaph. <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5324>standeth<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; He <S%H8199>judgeth<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%>.
How long will ye <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5766>unjustly<s%>, And <S%H5375>respect<s%> the <S%H6440>persons<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>? <S%H5542>Selah<s%>
Judge <S%H8199><s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>: Do <S%H6663>justice<s%> to the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H7326>destitute<s%>.
Rescue <S%H6403><s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>: <S%H6403>Deliver<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.

They <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H995>not<s%>, neither do they understand; They <S%H1980>walk<s%> to and fro in <S%H2825>darkness<s%>: All the <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are <S%H4131>shaken<s%>.
I <S%H559>said<s%>, Ye are <S%H430>gods<s%>, And all of you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High<s%>.
Nevertheless <S%H403><s%> ye shall <S%H4191>die<s%> like <S%H120>men<s%>, And <S%H5307>fall<s%> like <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%>.
Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>; For thou shalt <S%H5157>inherit<s%> all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
